title: Day “Guy that sings really loudly and is generally annoying”

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Sing loudly and obnoxiously at someone during the day, hiding any feeback that they or their visitors receive tomorrow night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-affected players are notified they were deafened and couldn’t receive info
-With the necronomicon, you shatter your target’s eardrums and deal a basic attack to them
